mapper.select: select ap.sell_bno, od.order_title, ap.point, ap.point_regDate from member_user m, accumulate_point ap, order_data od where m.user_num = #{user_num} and m.user_num = ap.user_num and ap.sell_bno = od.sell_bno group by ap.point_num order by ap.point_regDate desc

select up.sell_bno, od.order_title, up.point, up.point_regDate from member_user m, use_point up, order_data od where m.user_num = #{user_num} and m.user_num = up.user_num and up.sell_bno = od.sell_bno group by up.point_num order by up.point_regDate desc
mapper.insert: insert into accumulate_point(user_num, sell_bno, point) values (#{user_num}, #{sell_bno}, #{point})
insert into use_point(user_num, sell_bno, point) values (#{user_num}, #{sell_bno}, -#{point})
